articles.author: Hibaq Farah
articles.title: Meta launches web version of flagging Threads app - The Guardian
articles.description: ‘Twitter killer’ social media platform experienced initial boom in sign-ups when it launched in July
articles.content:
Meta has launched a web version of its Twitter killer social media platform Threads that can be used without an app, as it attempts to revive itself after a recent drop in usage.
The parent company … [+7181 chars]
